column4: i remember any tool for mac os which makes it possible to "produce" a video with swiching between usb cams and the desktop capture - is there something for ubuntu/linux?
there is video editing software for linux... take a look at ubuntustudio
or ask in #ubuntustudio ... they are into this sort of thing ... they might have a better idea whats out there
definately check out ubuntustudio .... you can add it on to regular Ubuntu through the synaptic manager
